ygData.subject: Re: Armor Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, thats nuts!  Over on the Xegony server the BEST prices i got for my stuff was 4 for bracers and mask, 8-10 for most stuff, tunic was like 12-15 i think.
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, thats nuts! Over on the Xegony server the BEST prices i got for my
stuff was 4 for bracers and mask, 8-10 for most stuff, tunic was like 12-15
i think. Heck I bought a RING mail coat for 15 pp! At any rate, that's the
cheapest I've seen it, but I haven't sen any prices near where yours lie.
Perhaps I should start smithing on the server and ruin the market, hehe!

Olphilio
